title: 1080i videos cause green pixelation and device grinds to a hault / power drains rapidly.
content:
Since Pixel 3XL was updated to android 10, 1080i videos (maybe just .ts files? on any application don't work. They just display strange green pixelation and the device performance plummets, battery drains rapidly and device becomes hot.

Tested in HDHomerun, Plex and IPTV smarters apps.

Also noticed and mentioned on Plex forums here:
https://forums.plex.tv/t/android-10-wont-direct-play-1080i/464971/6
